mapper.select: select * from entry where en_te_num = #{te_num} and en_me_num = #{me_num}

select entry.*, me_nickname, me_rating, me_tr_name, ct_cl_num from entry join team on en_te_num = te_num join member on en_me_num = me_num left join club_team on ct_te_num = te_num where te_mt_num = #{mt_num} order by en_te_num asc, me_rating desc;
mapper.insert: insert into entry(en_me_num, en_te_num) values (#{me_num}, ( select te_num from team join club_team on ct_te_num = te_num where te_mt_num = #{mt_num} and ct_cl_num = #{cl_num}))
